tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Highly recommending Harsha Dental Clinic to whoever is looking for a focused treatment. I found the doctors vet sensitive and caring. The staff is also is very respectful. The doctors have never imposed their treatment on me and have always asked for my opinion. I am really happy with the results. Literally going back with a smile now :)
 I came here based on positive reviews so I hope this feedback would also help others. All the best to the team Dantam!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
